MESSAGE FROM CORPORATE SECURITY

SECURITY NOTICE: Closure of MHQ Building on 26 Aug 2019 (Monday)

Based on a potential public activity bearing risks to HQ colleagues, the MHQ Building will be closed on 26 Aug 2019 (Monday) for one day.

As such, staff working at MHQ Building are informed NOT to return to the office building on Monday (26 Aug).

Corporate Security personnel may be contacted for assistance at Tel: 2993 7222.

Department Heads have to initiate Business Continuity Plan, make appropriate business arrangements and inform the affected parties accordingly.

Departmental Representatives,

Please ensure timely communication of the above messages to colleagues in your Department.


企業保安部訊息

保安公告：2019-08-26（星期一）關閉港鐵總部大樓

一項可能進行的公眾活動，會對在港鐵總部大樓辦公的人員構成風險，故大樓將於2019年8月26日（星期一）關閉一天 。

現通知各人員在8月26日（星期一）不要返回總部大樓。

如需協助，請致電2993 7222總部大樓控制中心，聯絡企業保安部人員。

各部門主管須啟動業務持續計劃，作出相應業務安排，並儘早通知各受影響單位及人士。

各部門代表:

請適時通知各部門同事有關上述訊息。
